import axios, { all } from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; const UpdateCustomer = () => { const params = useParams(); const [check, setCheck] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [getData, setGetData] = useState(); const allData = JSON.parse(params.id); const [data, id] = allData; const updateCustomer = data?.filter((txt) => txt.phone == id)[0]; const [user, setUser] = useState({ phone: updateCustomer.phone, customer_type: updateCustomer.customer_type, fname: updateCustomer.fname, lname: updateCustomer.lname, email: updateCustomer.email, address: updateCustomer.address, postalcode: updateCustomer.postalcode, link: updateCustomer.link, orgno: updateCustomer.orgno, orgname: updateCustomer.orgname, orgemail: updateCustomer.orgemail, orgaddress: updateCustomer.orgaddress, notes: updateCustomer.notes, }); const userHandler = event => { setUser({ ...user, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); if (user.customer_type == "Private") { setCheck(true); } else if (user.customer_type == "Bedrift") { setCheck(false); } } const submitHandler = async event => { event.preventDefault(); await axios.put(`http://localhost:10101/customer/${id}`, user); navigate('/dataman'); } const editHandler = () => { navigate('/dataman'); } return (

Update Customer

{ check ? <>
: "" }
) } export default UpdateCustomer;
